name: Bellforce(WIP)
description:
a short point-based game where the objective is to use your special ability(push, pull or destroy), to keep the falling square from reaching the bottom of the screen. This was made in 2 hours and 20 minutes by me, and it looks like crap because I had post-processing problems when I was making it so I had to get rid of it altogether.

Hopefully the controls are intuitive, left mouse button to spawn ability  at mouse location.  Stay alive for as long as you can.
